server-ip.description:
The IP Address the server will bind to.  Specifying no
value here will bind the server to all IPs.

server-port.description: The TCP Port that the server will listen on.

online-mode.description:
Determines if the server will check with Mojang if the
users are legitimate owners of the game.

white-list.description: Enables whitelisting of players on the server.

max-players.description: Determines the maximum number of players allowed online at any one time.

level-name.description: Name of the default world.  This is also used as a folder location.

hellworld.description: Determins if the world is a hell world or a normal world.

level-seed.description: A randomization seed for world generation.

allow-flight.description: This flag will determine if users are allowed to fly on the server.

spawn-protection.description:
The number of blocks around the spawn area that are considered "protected".
Only an admin can edit these blocks.

pvp.description: Determines whether players can hurt each other.

spawn-animals.description: Tells the server whether to allow animals to spawn in the server.

spawn-monsters.description: Tells the server wther to allow monsters to spawn in the server.
